passive.name: Mental Training
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. For every debuff on the enemy target, the wearer's CRIT DMG dealt against this target additionally increases by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, stacking up to {{3}} times. When using Ultimate to attack the enemy target, the wearer receives the Disputation effect, which increases DMG dealt by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong> and enables their follow-up attacks to ignore <orangeStrong>{{5, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of the target's DEF. This effect lasts for {{6}} turns.
